Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

tidyprompt (development version)

  • Added new prompt wraps: answer_as_category() & answer_as_multi_category()
  • Added llm_break_soft(), which can be used to interrupt prompt evaluation without causing an error
  • Added LLM provider which can be created from an ‘ellmer’ chat object: llm_provider_ellmer() (experimental)
  • Added ‘num_ctx’ parameter for Ollama LLM provider to more easily control the context window size
  • Added set_option() & `set_options() to Ollama LLM provider to more easily set options
  • Added a more detailed error message in case a LLM provider cannot be reached
  • Fixed errors in Google Gemini LLM provider
  • Adjusted handling of chat history objects to be safer (‘NA’ rows could cause errors in specific cases)
  • Adjusted lenient extraction for final answer extraction in chain-of-thought to be more flexible
  • Adjusted the printing of LLM respones to use message() instead of cat()

tidyprompt 0.0.1

CRAN release: 2025-01-08

  • Initial CRAN release

tidyprompt 0.0.0.9000

  • Initial development version available on GitHub
